4d5ef30f-643c-5c68-9194-cc8212279ca4.title: Submit Project Quality Plan for Survey, including survey procedures and evidence that they are capable of achieving the specified Orders of Accuracy, and strategy for the replacement of survey control marks and cadastral reference marks

meta.name: Clause 2.3.3 - Commencement of any work at the site

79e64a60-32ee-549f-8f60-9c932380145f.title: Documents listed under items (a) to (e) in Clause 2.9, at least 5 working days before commencement

meta.name: Clause 2.9 - Commencement of survey field work

77e1bae7-9116-593f-b5ff-43cec1d20dd7.title: Survey date and location, surveyor's name, description of methods and equipment to be used, at least 3 working days before commencement

3ae4cd53-27b9-50ff-9ff4-780f34025381.title: Survey report, including any calculations made to determine quantities, at least 1 working day before disturbing or covering up area of joint survey

meta.name: Clause 2.10.2 - Disturbing or covering up area of joint survey

1fe69b20-3edf-5bf5-b163-e82a6b0b4b23.title: Application for authorisation to remove Permanent Survey Marks, Cadastral Reference Marks and Bench Marks, together with Items (a) and (b) in Clause 3.1.2 at least 30 working days prior to commencement of construction activities near survey infrastructure (POSI)

3fd8490b-1c2a-562c-a03d-761c3edc5b1f.title: Receive Surveyor General's approval under the Surveying Regulation, at least 2 days before disturbing the mark (POSI)

meta.name: Clause 3.1.4 - Any activities that may cause removal, damage, destruction etc of a permanent control or cadastral mark

c20b81aa-c198-52c3-9434-5652722361ce.title: Submit survey report verifying coordinates and level values of the survey control marks, at least 10 working days before use of the marks. Where requested, submit the procedure for replacing the affected Primary Survey Control Marks

c67c91ca-ee2a-5689-8981-7bbbcd3a4b70.title: Submit the survey report detailing the site localisation used and the survey report detailing the machine specific Test Sites at least 5 working days before the use of Machine Guidance

meta.name: Clause 4.6.2 - Use of Machine Guidance, for purpose of guiding work

292ea6cf-d8d5-5a35-8c91-ca15e3bda5ee.title: Submit machine specific files and where applicable, instructions for uploading this information into the Machine Guidance System. Submit any quality assurance documents utilised in the process of generating these files

cc31a12f-e767-54f2-8616-0650fe86f6b4.title: Submit the plan of the Bridge Survey Control including coordinates, and the measurements and calculations used to determine the coordinates
